tool_description: Evaluates captured images for technical quality, sharpness, exposure, and color accuracy to ensure they meet archival standards before processing.

quality_standard.description: Quality benchmark to apply: basic, archival, publication, web

error_messages: Image file not found: Specified filename does not exist or is inaccessible
Invalid quality standard: Must be one of [basic, archival, publication, web]
Corrupted image file: File appears damaged or in unsupported format
Insufficient image resolution: Image does not meet minimum resolution requirements
Analysis failed: Technical error during quality assessment process
usage: Analyze each captured image immediately after photography to identify any technical issues requiring recapture. Set appropriate quality standards based on intended use.

passes_standard.description: Whether image meets specified quality standard

color_accuracy.description: Color accuracy assessment: poor, acceptable, good, excellent

recommendations.description: Suggestions for improvement if quality is insufficient
